allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Optimize pipeline to prevent execution timeouts

- Change default pipeline to skip full imports \(only refresh refunds\)
- Add new runFullPipelineWithImports\(\) for when full imports are needed
- Update menu items with clear fast/slow indicators
- Fast pipeline: 3-4 min \(refresh only\)
- Slow pipeline: 6+ min \(with full imports, may need multiple runs\)

Fixes: Exceeded maximum execution time error

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
